BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business
Oversight - Supporting New York City small businesses’ compliance with ADA and local laws promoting accessibility.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Supporting New York City small businesses’ compliance with ADA and local laws promoting accessibility.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to accessibility in small businesses
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of small business services to offer training and education to small businesses regarding accessibility of the workplace and inclusion of workers with disabilities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of small business services to offer training and education to small businesses regarding accessibility of the workplace and inclusion of workers with disabilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of legal assistance on compliance with accessibility laws for small business tenants
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of legal assistance on compliance with accessibility laws for small business tenants.

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing July 2 annually as Thurgood Marshall Day in the City of New York to promote his contributions and legacy as a pillar of the Civil Rights movement.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing July 2 annually as Thurgood Marshall Day in the City of New York.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Menin, Narcisse and Public Advocate Williams

Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
